ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of JAMES HUNTER SINCLAIR of New Westminster, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
